Text: Excellent remake of the twilight series!
@ Rondacss.   TB isnt a "REMAKE" of Twilight.  TB is based off the "The Southern Vampire Mysteries" by Charlaine Harris, first published in 2001.  The Twilight books didn't debut till 2005
And boy are the books good. The shows okay but the books rock.

What little I've watched seems fantastic.  Thank you so much DL_King for your downloads.

For potential downloaders- currently (10/15/09) that there is only 96.3% of this torrent available to be downloaded,  all of the missing parts are in season 1 (for me anyway).  However, if you download this, you can stop season 1 from downloading and still get season two.  Hopefully, someone will reseed to fix this, but if not, at least season two seems to be fine so far.
This is not a remake of the twilight series!!!!! This is based on the series of books "Sookie Stackhouse novels" which were written 4 years prior to the twilight series.
